Wonder & Welcome

A podcast conversation about parenting and following Jesus, hosted by Seth and Shannon Hein.

Subscribe:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • Overcast
  • rss

Parenting is hard! We know, we've been in the middle of it for over a decade. And we have needed a lot of help and encouragement along the way. That's why we wanted to create the Wonder & Welcome podcast. We've received so much help and support, we want to share some of that with you. We'd always appreciate your feedback and you can get in touch with us on email and or on instagram!

Latest Episode

8: A long time ago...

Jun 26, 2024

The Hein family traveled to Israel in September of 2023 and recorded a parenting conversation with dear friends Daniel and Shachar Harel. We cover diverse topics such as vineyards, bedtime routines, and losing your cool in Hebrew.

Past Episodes

7: Prayer and Fasting

Aug 8, 2023

Seth and Shannon discuss how they have including their children in times of prayer and fasting in the life of their church. There are lots of difficulties, but the work is worth it.

6: Weird Encouragements

Jul 18, 2023

Shan remembers things friends have said to her that turned out to be weirdly encouraging.

5: In Alphabetical Order

May 30, 2023

In this episode, we talk with the hilariously wonderful Curt and Brenda McCutchan.

4: A Communicative God

Apr 17, 2023

In this episode, we welcome our very first guest parents and talk about prayer, community, and the importance of working together.

3: Special Introductions

Mar 29, 2023

Today we are sharing with you a parenting seminar from the Confluence 2023 conference, with 4 of our favorite people: Rick and Gayle Hein, and Curt and Brenda McCutchan. Over the next few episodes we will be having both couples on as guests to share more wisdom, insights, and stories!

2: Not Unsolicited Comments

Mar 15, 2023

Input can feel like an attack, but it is often a gift. In this episode, Seth and Shannon discuss the importance of receiving input and feedback in parenting.

1: Encouragers and Squashers

Feb 28, 2023

Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome.
